text:
Hey,
I was wondering if you could help me out because I am trying to do criminology degree. I wanted to find out what kind of professional fields that I can get into with doing a criminology degree in university.
I am really interested in criminology and I want to find out how I can make a change in the society.

That's a very interesting question - I will get back to you after I chat to my neighbour - she is a lecturer in criminology, she looks at issues of gender in the prison system (among other things). Once I have spoken to her I will let you know what she says. Of course, a degree can help you in more than just the specific focus of the degree - I have never used any of my degree in my job. So for making a difference with a criminology degree, one option might be a think tank or charity. IPPR, Amnesty etc might be worth thinking about.
Thank you for helping me out and I’m sorry that I didn’t reply to you sooner.
No trouble, no pressure, I'll do my best to answer any questions you have
